About Me

Hey there! Welcome to my Personal Website!
I am a Software Engineer who want to change the world!

In this place, I am gonna share my knowledge and experience and record anything i learning. After All Teaching is learning right ? If you find anything wrong in my tech note! Please feel free to contact me. I will apprecite that. Thx!!!
